We'll talk about corporate benefits and opportunities you can use as an EPAM employee.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/Kazakhstan/Almaty/Education.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Trainings and Certifications\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information on certifications and various educational programs both inside the company and out.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/benefits/Kazakhstan/almaty/corporateprograms/employee-referral-program.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee Referral Program (Referral Bonus)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A description of the corporate referral program, under which any employee can recommend relatives or acquaintances for vacancies in the company. Upon successful completion of probation period, recommending employees receive bonuses according to the recommended employee's position.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/benefits/Kazakhstan/almaty/corporateprograms/life-events-bonuses.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compensation in the event of death of a close relative\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The company pays special attention and offers financial assistance to employees in the event of the death of a close relative. This section outlines the conditions for days off and compensation process.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/benefits/Kazakhstan/almaty/kids.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Child Care\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Programs focused on employees' children have important place among corporate benefits - holidays, creative lessons, a New Year party, gifts and more.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Get more information at Adaptation training. You will get invitations from a personnel manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Office Facilities\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The company makes special effort to create a comfortable atmosphere for work and relaxation (kitchen zones with refrigerators, microwaves and more; use of corporate printers, scanners and copiers; and much more).
